description: From the direction of a hallway to the east, a loud clanking noise as if someone or something is bashing a metal object, Echoes into the vaulted chamber.  The tattered remains of an old tapestry lie heaped in a corner, partially concealing a broken metal rod from which it once was suspended.  Flickering light from five torches to the east create the sensation of dark figures moving back and forth in nearby shadows.
title: [Marsh Keep, Dungeon Vault]
